Sentencas: Fuel cells convert the chemical energy present in fuel (e.g., hydrogen) into electrical energy with high efficiency, low pollution and low noise.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Of the various types of fuel cells, the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) was developed specifically for power plants and residual power systems.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SOFCs are classified into three categories based on their shape: planar, cylindrical and flat-tube.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The flat-tube SOFC (FT-SOFC) exhibits the advantages of ease in sealing, low stack volume and low current-collecting resistance.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, due to its weak strength, the FT-SOFC may get deformed or break during the manufacturing process.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To improve the cell strength, the cell support must be thickened.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, as the support thickness is increased, the electrons must travel a longer distance, which leads to an increase in the electrical resistance.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In another method, the hydrogen channel diameter can be reduced for the strong strength.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: But, it may lead to a corresponding decrease in the hydrogen mass transfer rate.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this manuscript, we study the performance of several FT-SOFC designs and suggest the better design.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The numerical analysis for the FT-SOFC incorporates several physical phenomena such as gas flow, heat transfer and electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The governing equations (i.e., mass, momentum, energy and species balance equations) are calculated for heat and mass transfer.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage, activation polarization, ohmic polarization and contact resistance are simulated simultaneously.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The experimental results are compared with the numerical data for the purposes of code validation.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The current density and temperature distribution are then investigated on the SOFC surface.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The average current density decreases by 14.6% if the hydrogen channel diameter is narrowed by 50%, and by 10.2% if the support thickness is increased by 50%.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Based on these results, we present a design for a stack of FT-SOFCs.
Titulo: A numerical study on anode thickness and channel diameter of anode-supported flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells
